But only stays with me because going after her would be a dick move.The worst part is, I can't tell anyone. Obviously I cannot tell him that I looked through his phone nor can I tell my best friend.I have been crying ever since and don't know how to carry on this relationship. How am I supposed to have a straight face when meeting him??I cannot imagine hanging out with them together
